title: Four COVID-19 fatalities confirmed
body_lines: Sri Lanka’s COVID-19 death toll rose to 16,469 following the confirmation of four COVID-19 fatalities on Monday.
According to the Department of Government Information, two COVID-19 fatalities confirmed on Monday were over 60 years, one was between 30 and 59 years, and one was below 30 years.
Of the total COVID-19 deaths, 76.28% are from the over-60 age group, 22.41% are from the 30 to 59 age group, and 1.31% are from the under-30 age group.
A total of 9,290 COVID-19 deaths confirmed to date are male and 7,179 are female. Three COVID-19 fatalities confirmed on Monday were male and one was female.
